Text.Page: The {@LinkCreature:47#3003#argonomorph wendigo shamans}, along with their underlings, the {@LinkCreature:47#3002#argononomorph wendigos} and {@LinkCreature:47#3001#contaminated wendigos} are making trouble in {@Rgn:47004$$Blightroar}. Take their tokens to {@Creature:247#1005$$Chenace} and she'll reward you for your work.
Thanks for taking care of that, <PCNAME>.
Just take care of those {@LinkCreature:47#3001#contaminated wendigos}, {@LinkCreature:47#3002#argononomorph wendigos}, and the {@LinkCreature:47#3003#argonomorph wendigo shamans}, and I'll be happy.
